channel.title: Comments on: A big loss to our community
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: genomon
item.dc:creator: genomon
item.description: Sadly I never had the pleasure of meeting her. So sorry for the loss! You said it best:<br /> "Remember to cherish each day we have with our families, friends and everything else you take on in life."
item.content:encoded:
Sadly I never had the pleasure of meeting her. So sorry for the loss! You said it best:
“Remember to cherish each day we have with our families, friends and everything else you take on in life.”

item.title: By: Tim Benninghoff
item.dc:creator: Tim Benninghoff
item.description: Ted, I'm so sorry. I'm glad I was able to meet her and talk to her at a couple SQL events and I remember her as an enthusiastic and kind person.
item.content:encoded: Ted, I’m so sorry. I’m glad I was able to meet her and talk to her at a couple SQL events and I remember her as an enthusiastic and kind person.
